inn1.comm: and Roach strikes first ball! fuller length delivery outside the off stump, pitched closed to the off stump line and Tamim has a go at it, ball clips the outside edge and goes straight to the keeper. Now that's a start!
good length delivery and this one nipped back in a long way. Ashraful is caught on the back-foot and the ball thuds in to the pad. Appeal for lbw turned down
good length and drifting down the leg side, Ashraful fails to gets a touch on it and the ball rolls down to fine leg, off the pad, easy single and Bangladesh are away
short of a good length and the ball moved away, lot of encouragement for the bowler here - Siddique leaves it through to the keeper
wide outside the off stump with the ball swinging away further from the left-hander. Rightly called a wide
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Siddique stands tall on the back-foot and punches it away well in front of point
fuller length and Siddique drives it straight to Miller at mid-off who fails to stop it cleanly. End of a good first over from Roach
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, not much moment there for Pascal. Ashraful leaves it through to the keeper
full and wide outside the off stump, width offered and Ashraful lofts it over the fielder at point. Made it look easy
better line and length, close to the off stump line and Ashraful shoulders arms
wayward delivery outside the off stump, keeper fails to stop it and the batsman cross over
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Siddique gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
poor delivery down the leg side -  second wide of the over
again down the leg side and this time the ball clips the pad and goes past the keeper
short rising delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Ashraful leaves it through to the keeper
good length delivery on the stumps, defended off the back-foot and the ball rolls back to the bowler
bit of width offered outside the off stump, Siddique moves back and across and hits it in the air and well wide of the fielder at mid-off.
defended down the track to the silly mid-off region and they scamper through for a single.
short and drifting on to the pads, Ashraful pulls but fails to make contact
short rising delivery, pitched outside the off stump and angling in. Ashraful gets right on top of the bounce and defends it down on the off side. Well played
another line and length delivery - Ashraful defends off the back-foot
on the middle and off stump line, Siddique defends it away well in front of point - fielder moves in quickly and cuts off the single
shot! good length delivery outside the off stump, not wide enough to free his arms but Siddique stays back and drives it through the gap between point and cover. Excellent placement
four more! full and on the stumps, Siddique steps forward and hits on the up to the midwicket fence
forced away towards point, no room for a single there
dropped! pitched up outside the off stump and Siddique drives it straight back to Pascal who fails to hold on to a sharp catch. Always difficult to catch those on the move
on the middle and off stump line and Siddique defends it with a straight bat
pitched up on the off stump line and Ashraful works it away across the line to the fielder at square leg
short of a good length and this one nipped back in, Ashraful tries to defend off the back-foot and the ball rolls away off the inner half of the bat
rising delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
short of a good length delivery, pitched outside the off stump and coming in with the angle. Ashraful gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
good length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful has a swing at it and the ball goes past the bat
wide delivery outside the off stump
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards cover
sensational stop! short delivery outside the off stump and Siddique dispatches it towards short cover where Lewis dives across to his left and cuts off a certain boundary
punched down to mid-on
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
good length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful comes down the track and hammers it through the gap between cover and point. Lovely shot
better delivery, on the middle and off stump line and Ashraful has no option but to defend
short and wide outside the off stump, Ashraful sways back and cuts it away towards point where Smith dives across to his right and cuts it off. Another clean stop
short ball outside the off stump and that's pulled away towards midwicket
swing and a miss, was short and wide outside the off stump and Ashraful gives it everything but fails to connect
short rising delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful stands tall and defends it away towards point
another wide delivery outside the off stump, probably the slower delivery gone wrong - was there to be hit and Ashraful flays it through covers
four more! short delivery on the stumps and Ashraful pulls it away behind square on the leg side
defended towards cover, solid shot
good length delivery outside the off stump, Siddique gets a good stride in and punches it away well wide of the fielder at mid-off. Easy single
short delivery outside the off stump, not wide enough to free his arms - Ashraful stays back and taps it away well wide of the fielder at gully
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Siddique tries to clips it away on the leg side but ends up with an inside edge on to his pad - appeal for lbw turned down
forced away towards cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, Siddique stays back and pushes it away towards point
short and wide outside the off stump, Siddique tries to pulls it away on the on side but fails to make contact
on the stumps, defended watchfully
Ashraful comes down the track even before the ball is bowled and Bernard rolls his fingers over it, in the end Ashraful has a swing at it  but misses the target by miles
forced away well wide of the fielder at point
pitched up outside the off stump, Siddique steps forward and drives it away into the gap between cover and mid-off. Bit of hesitation going for the second and in the end they decide against it
slower delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful picks it up and taps it away on the off side
good length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful gets well forward and drives it down to long-off for a single
drifting down the leg side and the ball rolls away of the pad to square leg
slower delivery on the middle and off stump line, Siddique leans forward and defends it back to the bowler
width offered outside the off stump and Siddique hits past the diving fielder at short cover
short of a good length delivery, this one came in with the angle - Ashraful stays back and tucks it away towards square leg
on the pads and Siddique effortlessly lofts it away to the midwicket fence. Good clean hit and that brings up the 50 partnership
taps it away on the off side
on the middle and leg stump line, Ashraful defends it down on the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump and that's forced away on the off side, easy single added to the total
clipped away of the pads to the midwicket region
good length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful taps it down on the off side, early call and they scamper through for a single - well judged single
turned away off the pads to the deep midwicket region
slower delivery outside the off stump, cutting in - Ashraful gets behind the line and defends it down on the off side
short rising delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Siddique leaves it through to the keeper
good length delivery outside the off stump, probably the slower delivery - Siddique pushes forward and drives it past the cover fielder
defended off the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards point. Ashraful calls for the single but Siddique was not interested
worked away off the pads, straight to the fielder at square leg
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Ashraful comes down the track and has a swing at it, ball zips past the outside edge and over the stumps to the keeper
defended down on the leg side, end of a good over
driven through the vacant mid-on region, easy single
worked away through square leg
short of a good length delivery on the pads, Siddique moves across a bit and clips it away to deep backward square leg - they sprint across for the first run and comfortably comes back for the second
punched down to long-on, yet another easy single added to the total
driven past the cover fielder
steps forward and across and punches it through midwicket, once again they run hard for the first run and steals a second run
clipped away off the pads to the fine leg region, fielder moves in quickly from the deep and cuts off the second run
driven off the front-foot to the cover region
short delivery outside the off stump and Siddique pulls it away on the leg side, Reifer at short midwicket gets in the way
short and close to the off stump line, Siddique goes back and across and runs it down to third man for a single
on the middle and off stump line, angling in with the arm - Ashraful moves across a long way and taps it away straight to the fielder at short midwicket
defended down on the off side and they scamper through for a single, Bernard who was moving in from point fails it pick it up cleanly and Siddique makes it across safely
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
good length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful gets well forward and defends it away on the off side
rolls his finger over this one, Ashraful has a go at it outside the off stump and is beaten
turned away off the pads to the short fine leg reigon
good length delivery down the leg side
pitched up outside the off stump, Siddique pushes forward and punches it down to mid-on
fulltoss on the pads, was there to be hit but Siddique only manages to tap it away to deep backward square leg
punched away towards cover point
on the middle and leg stump line, Ashraful leans forward and defends it down the track
forced away off the back-foot to the cover region, Siddique calls for the single and makes it across comfortably
full and on the pads, Siddique punches it down to mid-on - the fielder is deep and they scamper through for a single
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump and Ashraful glides it down to third man for a single
worked away on the leg side
pitched up on the off stump line, Siddique steps forward and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-on
again fuller and on the pads, driven straight to the fielder at midwicket
good length delivery outside the off stump and that's driven straight to the fielder at cover. This is good cricket from West Indies.
on the pads and that's driven away on the leg side, diving stop from the fielder at short midwicket saves few runs

Siddique departs! fuller length delivery outside the off stump, they dried up the runs and under pressure Siddique tries to go over the top but the shot is not timed well enough and Lewis at mid-off takes it cleanly. This is good stuff from West Indies
good length delivery outside the off stump and Raqib is beaten all ends up. End of a wicket maiden
fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and pushes it back onto the pitch
fuller on the middle and off. Ashraful comes forward and drives it to the left of the fielder at long-off for a single. He wanted a couple there but good fielding by Pascal prevented it
worked away to short fine-leg
on the middle stump. Raqibul comes forward and dead-bats it onto the pitch
does the same as he dead-bats a ball outside the off stump
pushes it to cover off a fuller delivery on the off stump. He is rightfully sent back by Ashraful
bowls one just inside the line outside the off stump. It was just a little short of being called a wide
fuller on the off and middle. Ashraful guides it with soft hands to cover and sets off for a single. A direct throw would have meant curtains for Ashraful
good length delivery outside the off stump. Raqibul defends off the back foot and gets an outside edge which just falls short of the second slip fielder
turns it to the right of midwicket and runs across for a single
comes forward and defends it easily
fuller outside the off stump. Ashraful plays it with soft hands and wants a single. Raqibul shouts a loud no and Ashraful is frustrated
good length on the middle and leg. Raqibul plays it to the leg side
fuller on the middle and leg. Raqibul moves across and sweeps it away to fine-leg for a boundary
outside the off stump and Raqibul drives it back to the bowler
short outside off. Cuts to short third man
outside off. Raqibul comes forward and plays it watchfully to cover
on the middle and leg. Raqibul unfurls the sweep yet again and the result is the same- a boundary
outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
on the middle and leg. Ashraful makes room and pushes it back to the bowler
short outside off. Cut to short third man for a single
on the middle and leg. Raqibul comes forward and defends
wide outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and drives it to the cover fielder
on the off stump. Raqibul plays with soft hands to point
flighted on the leg stump. Ashraful paddles it to fine-leg for a couple
does Ashraful break the shackles? Seems like he wants to as he makes room to a delivery outside off and goes inside-out to sweeper cover for a boundary
opens the face of the bat to a delivery outside off as he runs it down to third man for a single
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
outside the off stump and Raqibul pushes it to cover
on the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
short outside off. Raqibul stands tall and defends it
fuller on the off and middle as Raqibul pushes it away to mid-on for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump. Ashraful wants to cut it late to third man and the pace surprises him as he plays it off the back foot
good length delivery outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and defends
fuller outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
fuller outside he off stump as Raqibul replicates Ashraful and takes a single

and he gets the breakthrough. He makes the ball move back in a touch at a fuller length outside the off stump. Raqibul is looking to run it down to third man without quite opening the face of the bat. He suffers as he gets an inside-edge onto the stumps and has to walk back
full-toss to begin with as Shakib puts it away to deep square-leg for a single
outside the off stump. Ashraful opens the face of the bat just before the impact as he runs it down to third man for a single. Ashraful wants a couple but Shakib rejects it
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib drives it to sweeper cover for a single and gets the hundred up for the team
outside off. Comes forward and pushes it to cover
on the leg stump. Ashraful  closes the face of the bat and turns it to square leg for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Ashraful comes forward and drives it to mid-off
fuller on the off stump. Ashraful is unable to clear the fielder at mid-off
on the leg stump. Ashraful works it away to deep square leg for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib gets a stride forward as the ball is being bowled and drives it to long-off for a single
on the leg stump. Ashraful gets an inside-edge onto his pads for single as the ball trickles to square-leg
on the pads. Shakib turns it away to fine-leg for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib square drives it to deep point for a single
on the middle stump. Ashraful pushes it back to the bowler
outside the off stump. Ashraful runs it down to the left of third man for a couple
fuller on the leg stump. Ashraful turns it away to fine-leg for a single
fuller on the off stump. Shakib gets an inside edge as he drives it back to the bowler
on the leg stump. Shakib forces it to midwicket for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, Shakib walks forward and drives but only manages to hit it back to the bowler on the bounce
short and wide outside the off stump, Shakib cuts off the back-foot and gets it away square on the off side
short delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful waits for the ball and at the last moment taps it down to third man for a single
good length and that's driven away towards cover, not a well timed shot
driven off the front-foot, straight to the fielder at short midwicket
driven off the back-foot to the long-off region. That's the end of a good spell form Bernard
turned away with the spin to the square leg region
flat delivery, turning in from outside the off stump. Shakib goes back, makes room and cuts it away through point
defended on the back-foot
short ball and Shakib taps it away through square leg
pitched close to the off stump line and turning away - Ashraful waits for the ball to turn and then taps it down to short third man for an easy single
cut away straight to the fielder at point
starts off with a short ball and that's cut straight to the fielder at point
fuller length delivery and Ashraful lofts it over the fielder at point
short delivery outside the off stump, bowled from round the stumps, Shakib goes back and hits it across the line to wide long-on
full and on the stumps, Ashraful taps it down to mid-on
short ball, turning in from outside the off stump - Shakib goes back, stands tall and punches it down to long-on
driven off the back-foot to deep cover
turning across from the leg stump line, Ashraful stays back and works it away on the leg side. Shakib calls for the single but Ashraful sends him back
lofted over the infield to deep cover
cut away off the back-foot, straight to the fielder at point
tossed up outside the off stump, Ashraful pushes forward and drives it back to the bowler
again driven down the track and that's fielded by the bowler
full and on the pads, Ashraful leans forward and works it away through the vacant midwicket region
tossed up delivery, Ashraful makes room and lofts it inside out to deep cover, well controlled shot
bit of turn and Ashraful defends watchfully
on the middle and leg stump line, Ashraful stays back and defends it down on the leg side
driven straight back to the bowler
steps forward and hits across the line to deep square leg

short ball and Shakib cuts it away towards cover - Ashraful had been struggling but they decide to go for the single. The throw comes in over the stumps and Fletcher quickly takes off the bails - they go upstairs and the RED light flashes
worked away off the pads to the midwicket region
turning away, Rahim stays back and taps it away behind the stumps on the off side, diving stop from the fielder at slip cuts off the single
quicker delivery, defended stretching well forward
short and wide outside the off stump, turning away - Rahim quickly goes back and cuts it away through cover point
swept away in the air to deep midwicket
turn and bounce outside the off stump and Rahim is beaten comprehensively
fuller length delivery and that's driven down to long-on
pushed away well wide of the fielder at point, Rahim takes off for the single but Shakib was not interested
swept away to deep backward square leg
forced away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
defended down on the off side and they scamper through for a single - well run
driven away on the leg side, fails to get it past the fielder at short midwicket
defended down on the off side and Shakib takes off for a single, Rahim is not interested and Shakib had to dive full length to get back in safely. A better throw would have been interesting
cut away off the back-foot to the point region
comes down the track and works it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
full and on the stumps, Rahim steps forward and drives it down to long-off. They think about the second but decide against it
driven away through covers, Dowlin hits the stumps at the bowler's end from the deep but no damage is done
worked away towards midwicket, straight to the fielder there
fulltoss outside the off stump and that's driven straight back to the bowler
cut away off the back-foot to the point region, quick single taken
flat delivery outside the off stump, Rahim gets forward and drives it away to deep cover
short ball outside the off stump, Shakib goes back and cuts it away behind point. Fielder in the deep moves across quickly and cuts off the boundary
driven straight  back down the track, Miller fails to stop it cleanly and the batsmen cross over for a single
punched down to long-on, easy single to end the over
Rahim sweeps across the line and the ball goes high up in the air to deep midwicket
short ball, cut away off the back-foot to the point region. Diving stop from Sammy there saves runs
worked away on the leg side for a brace
cut away from right in front of the stumps, fails to get it past the fielder at backward point
gone! short delivery, was close to the off stump line - Rahim goes back and cuts hard but only manages to slice it straight to the fielder at backward point. Bangladesh five down.
pushed away well in front of point and he is off the mark straightaway
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Mahmudullah stays back and forces it away towards point
quick delivery outside the off stump, Mahmudullah has a poke at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
punched away off the back-foot to the point region
short and wide outside the off stump, was there to be hit but Mahmudullah fails to make contact
bit to straight and Mahmudullah clips it away towards square leg
bouncer down the leg side and that's rightly called a wide, the idea was good but the line was bad
driven off the back-foot and the ball goes straight to the fielder at cover
on the middle and leg stump line, Mahmudullah gets forward and paddles it down to short fine leg
flat delivery outside the off stump, Shakib works it away to square leg for a single
tossed up in the channel outside the off stump, hint of turn - Mahmudullah gets well forward and drives it down to long-off
turning in from outside the off stump, Shakib goes back and cuts it away straight to the fielder at short third man
driven on the up, once again straight to the fielder
worked away on the leg side, finally they get the single
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Shakib stays back and punches it down to mid-off. Early call and a quick single is added to the total
short of a good length delivery on the stumps, Mahmudullah goes back and defends it down on the leg side
driven down to mid-off, not a well time shot. Bernard fails to hit the stumps at the bowler's end and and extra run is added to the total
driven on the up and the ball goes through Reifer at cover
MAX! short delivery on the stumps, Mahmudullah rocks back, winds up and pulls it away well over the fielder at deep backward square leg. Clean hit
driven well wide of the fielder at cover. End of a good over for Bangladesh
full and on the pads, Mahmudullah nicely turns it away towards the vacant square leg region
fulltoss outside the off stump and that's driven to deep cover
hit down to long-off, not in full control there
tossed up outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward
pitched close to the off stump and turning away sharply, Mahmudullah pushes forward to defend and the ball zips past the outside end
defended watchfully and the ball rolls away on the off side
full and on the stumps, Shakib digs it down to mid-on. Fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
high fulltoss outside the off stump, Shakib swing hard but only manages to hit it down to mid-off
another fulltoss and another miss from Shakib - this time he hit it square on the off side but fails to get it past the fielder at backward point
another fulltoss, third in a row and this time Shakib punches it down to long-off. Just a single
good length delivery, this one came in with the angle. Mahmudullah pushes forward and punches it down to mid-on for a single
clipped away off the pads to square leg for a single - again the shot is not timed well enough to beat the fielder
short ball, turning in from outside the off stump. Shakib goes back and pulls it down to long-on for a single
quicker delivery outside the off stump, turning away, Mahmudullah gets forward and drives it away towards point

another solid hit from Mahmudullah! tossed up delivery outside the off stump, Mahmudullah comes down the track, gets right to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it well over the fielder at long-off. Big six
defended down on the leg side, watchfully played
driven with the turn and through covers
played back down the track, the bowler moves across to his left and cuts off the single
pitched up and drifting down the leg side, Mahmudullah waits on it and clips it down to fine leg
short delivery down the leg side - horrible line to say the least
good length delivery outside the off stump, Mahmudullah steps forward and drives it away towards cover
pitched up outside the off stump and that's forced away wide of the fielder at cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away movement and Mahmudullah is beaten outside the off stump - well bowled
another good delivery, good length and in the channel outside the off stump, Mahmudullah defends it with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
cut away late to the third man region, single to end the over
forced away on the off side and they scamper through for a single
turned away off the back-foot to the vacant midwicket region, Sammy sprints across and cuts off the second run - excellent effort
wayward delivery down the leg side, humongous wide
slower delivery, Mahmudullah comes down the track and flays it away through covers, excellent timing and placement and the fielder in the deep had no chance of cutting it off
and one down the leg side, Sammy is struggling a bit here
on the leg stump line and Mahmudullah taps it away on the leg side
full and drifting down the leg side, Mahmudullah tries to work it away fine but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away of the pad
driven away well wide of the fielder at long-on. 50 partnership comes up between these two. 50 in 49 balls - Well played
well outside the off stump, Mahmudullah moves across and tries to paddle it down to fine leg but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad. Half hearted appeal for lbw turned down
fuller length delivery and Shakib drives it down to long-on
cut away late, fielder at short third man moves across to his left and saves few runs
leans forward, makes it in to a full toss and paddles it down to fine leg for a brace. Had to run hard for the second and Mahmudullah made it across safely in the end
cut away to short third man, quick single taken
hit across the line to deep midwicket, was in the air for sometime but well wide of the fielders
good length delivery outside the off stump, Mahmudullah hits across the line and gets it away to the midwicket fence.
makes room and tries to hit inside out but fails to make contact

fuller length delivery on the stumps, Mahmudullah moves across a long way and looks to loft it away to deep midwicket but fails to make contact. Appeal for lbw turned down - probably pitched outside the leg stump
driven straight back to the bowler
pitched up outside the off stump and Mahmudullah goes hard at it, ball clips the outer half of the bat and races away to the vacant backward point fence
comes down the track and drives it down to long-off. Smith in the deep fails to collect it cleanly and the batsmen steal another run
makes room, takes it on the full and drives it right in to the gap between cover and mid-off. Excellent placement
full and on the pads, Shakib pushes forward and lofts it down to the wide long-on fence. The boundary brings up his 50 - well played
slower delivery outside the off stump, Shakib moves across a long way and sweeps it away to short fine leg, he was looking to go over the top but the shot was not timed well enough
goes for the reverse sweep and makes contact, two more runs added to the total

tossed up outside the off stump and Mahmudullah drives away from his body. Not a well timed shot and the ball lobs up towards point. Bernard there moves across quickly, dives to his left and takes it cleanly. Fantastic catch to end a fantastic innings
pushes at one outside the off stump and gets beaten
pitched up on the pads and Shakib drives it away to wide long-on

gone! fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Shakib moves across a long away and tries to scoop it over the fielder at short fine leg but fails to clip it cleanly and Dowlin at short fine leg nicely settles under it
defended down on off side and they scamper through for a single
fulltoss outside the off stump and Razzak hits it in to the pitch and the ball bounces back to the bowler

Roach bags another one! good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Razzaq tries to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball hits the pad right in front of the stumps. Loud appeal and umpire Doctrove had no hesitation in raising his finger.
full and wide outside the off stump, Rasel goes low and taps it away behind the stumps on the off side. End of a good over from Roach
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line and that's forced away towards cover for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump and that's driven away towards point - diving stop there saves runs but fails to cut off the single
taps it down on the off side and they scamper through for a single
hit straight to the fielder at midwicket and another risky single is added to the total. Throw at the bowler's end fails to hit the target
worked away through midwicket, the first run is taken quickly and they run hard for the second as well
fulltoss outside the off stump and Rasel drives it down to long-off. This time they settle for a single
fulltoss outside the off stump and that's punched down to long-off
full and drifting down the leg side, Naeem fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad to the short fine leg region
5-for! full and on the stumps - you miss, I hit. Rasel opens up and hits across the line but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the stumps. Bangladesh 9 down.
good length delivery outside the off stump and Hossain slices it down to third man for a single
fulltoss on the stumps and Naeem punches it down to long-off, mis-field allows the batsman to come back for the second
again punched down to long-on, this time they take on the fielder in the deep and makes it across for the second

inn2.comm: outside the off stump and left alone by Richards
outside the off stump and coming back in. Richards gets onto the back foot and pushes it to cover
fuller outside the off stump. Richards again plays it off the back foot to cover
fuller on the middle and leg. Richards comes onto the front foot and pushes it to mid-on
short on the middle and off. Richards makes some room for himself and cuts it to cover for a single. Fletcher stuttered before making it to the danger end
fuller on the leg stump. Fletcher comes onto the front foot and defends
begins with a wide down the leg side

and Richards has just one run on debut! Pitching on the leg stump and turning ever so slightly as Richards thrusts the pad as his defence and is plumb in front. The umpire Doctrove has no hesitation in lifting the finger
on the leg stump. Smith gets onto the back foot and turns it away to deep square leg for a single
comes forward and defends
quicker one on the middle stump. Fletcher gets his bat down in time to defend it
short outside the off stump. Fletcher cuts it away to sweeper cover for a single
outside the off stump. Smith moves across and defends it off the back foot
fuller on the off stump. Fletcher comes forward and drives it through extra-cover for a boundary, the first of the innings
short on the off and middle. Fletcher gets on the back foot and defends it
outside the off stump and left alone by Fletcher
fuller on the middle and off as Fletcher comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler

and there is the breakthrough! Rasel pitches one upto the batsman and slower in pace outside the off stump. Fletcher goes for the drive and all he manages is an inside-edge. Both the openers are back in the hut before we can say go
fuller on the off stump. Reifer drives it off the back foot to cover
good length delivery on the leg stump. Smith picks it off his pads to deep midwicket for a couple. He could have easily had three runs but sloppy running there
on the middle stump. Smith comes forward and defends
on the leg stump. Smith forces it to midwicket for a single
on the middle stump. Reifer comes forward and defends
